org.wfp.fittest.config

Class PersistenceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wfp.fittest.config.PersistenceConfig

  • @Configuration
@EnableTransactionManagement
@EnableJpaRepositories(basePackages="org.wfp.fittest.repository")
@Import(value=RestConfig.class)
@PropertySource(value="classpath:data-access.properties")
public class PersistenceConfig
extends Object
    PersistenceConfig defines the configuration options for the data source used FITTESTPlanner.

    The data source configuration options are read from the properties file classpath:data-access.properties which defined the jdbc url, username and password. Hibernate options are defined in the properties file classpath:hibernate.properties. Hibernate options will override the default options specified for the data source.

    Author:
    Sami Zeinelabdin

    • Method Detail

      • dataSource

        @Bean
public DataSource dataSource()
        Configures the default data source used by the FITTESTPlanner application.

        The data source defined the database location(url) as well as the username and password used to login to the database.

        Returns:
        DataSource
        See Also:
        DriverManagerDataSource, TransactionAwareDataSourceProxy

      • hibernateProperties

        @Bean
public Properties hibernateProperties()
        Returns a Properties object that was read from the file classpath:hibernate.properties.
        Returns:
        Properties object

      • jpaVendorAdapter

        @Bean
public org.springframework.orm.jpa.vendor.HibernateJpaVendorAdapter jpaVendorAdapter()
        Configures the hibernate JPA Vendor adapter.

        The database type is set to Database.POSTGRESQL.

        Returns:
        HibernateJpaVendorAdapter
        See Also:
        HibernateJpaVendorAdapter, Database

      • entityManagerFactory

        @Bean(name="entityManagerFactory")
public org.springframework.orm.jpa.LocalContainerEntityManagerFactoryBean entityManagerFactory()
        Configures the entity manager factory.

        Sets the default data source using the dataSource() method. Sets JPA Vendor adapter using the jpaVendorAdapter() method. Sets Hibernate properties using the hibernateProperties() method. Entities in the package org.wfp.fittest.entity are scanned automatically.

        Returns:
        LocalContainerEntityManagerFactoryBean
        See Also:
        EntityManagerFactory

      • transactionManager

        @Bean
public org.springframework.transaction.PlatformTransactionManager transactionManager()
        Configures default JPA transaction behavior.
        Returns:
        PlatformTransactionManager
        See Also:
        PlatformTransactionManager
